original_title: Harvey Walden Presents: Fighting Fit, Fighting Fat
overview: Join Gunnery Sergeant Harvey Walden IV, co-host of VH1's hit show CELEBRITY FIT CLUB in FIGHTING FIT, FIGHTING FAT as he instructs you in a mission to get fit and lose weight. You've seen him in action, helping celebrites lose weight and improve their fitness; now you can follow his ultimate workout yourself. Aimed at all ages and all levels of fitness, this program is designed to produce a flatter, firmer stomach, toned arms, buttocks and thighs and more energy; improving fitness and creating weight loss. GET FIT, TONE UP AND LOSE WEIGHT - 3 STAGES TO A SLIMMER, FITTER YOU!!!
title: Harvey Walden Presents: Fighting Fit, Fighting Fat
